EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_DevNexus_Atlanta_Q119.2019DevNexusPostEvent
EmailTemplate.subject: Wow, we learned a lot at DevNexus didn’t we?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It was great to see you at DevNexus Atlanta. We hope you enjoyed yourself. It was an exciting event with lots to take in don’t you think? That’s why once things have settled down a little, we like to reach out and offer a bit of extra content that we think you’ll find interesting.
Here are some great resources that will keep your “knowledge-bank” topped up:
- The Spring Blog <[[https://spring.io/blog?utm_campaign=global_event_devnexus_atlanta_q119&utm_source=&utm_medium=email]]> has all the latest technology news and announcements. - The Bootiful Podcast <[[https://soundcloud.com/a-bootiful-podcast/]]> has insights and interviews from the world of Spring - The This Week in Spring <[[https://spring.io/blog/2019/03/19/this-week-in-spring-march-19th-2019?utm_campaign=global_event_devnexus_atlanta_q119&utm_source=&utm_medium=email]]> newsletter covers what’s new every week - Subscribe to the latest Spring Developer Videos on YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/SpringSourceDev]]>
And, check out these popular highlights <[[https://content.pivotal.io/devnexus-2019?utm_campaign=global_event_devnexus_atlanta_q119&utm_source=&utm_medium=email]]>.
Finally, be sure to join us this October in Austin, Texas for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_campaign=global_event_devnexus_atlanta_q119&utm_source=&utm_medium=email]]>, the biggest cloud-native Java conference in the world. Sign up now for a full day of pre-conference training, Spring Professional Certification <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/schedule?utm_campaign=global_event_devnexus_atlanta_q119&utm_source=&utm_medium=email]]> and the opportunity to connect with Spring community leaders. Get $200 off your SpringOne Platform ticket by using the code Attendee_Event_200 when you register.
Thanks The Pivotal Team
